title: Smart Data Models - Indicator for sustainable development goals
description: Measure of a project's degree of development. Associated to target values to be reached and monitored. Divided in impact indicators and management ones.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to Action

refProject.description: Relationship. Id of the related project

expectedValue.description: Property. Expected value of the indicator

calculationForm.description: Property. Formula for the calculation  of the indicator

modifications.description: Property. Changes that the action has incorporated in a possible update
